author: dirkjaeckel
content:
Apparently the Ecosystem Support Program (ESP) is putting together a new wishlist for potential funding opportunities: https://esp.ethereum.foundation/applicants/wishlist
I’ve heard they’re currently gathering ideas from various EF teams.
I’m trying to figure out which team might be interested in proposals aimed at enabling permissionless and trustless mobile wallets. My long‑term goal is a mobile wallet that can operate without any centralized backend. It would be great to see a wishlist item that encourages proposals aligned with this goal.
